title: Add a test to ensure examples have a paragraph with an id before them
description:
From #13357 (comment)

Maybe for another PR, but we will need a test that ensures we have these IDs in expected places so it is not forgotten for new documentation.

In #13205 (comment) we decided how/where we are going to have anchors for each example. The agreed-upon decision requires us to put an id on the paragraph before each example.

A test needs to be written to assert that every paragraph(

) before a macro() has an id="xx" attribute.
